title: removed publish step and the script from the ci
body: We'll use `cargo ws publish` to publish the crates.

title: Remove unused deps and upgrade used ones
body:
- Removes unused dependencies with `cargo udeps`
- Upgrade all dependencies, including breaking `serde_yaml`  and `tokio`
- Adds clean up to tests to delete the repository director

title: add error message and tracing for #188
body: This one adds a few `watch!` macros and an error message for not found cache digests for issue #188

title: add build script and mermaid support to netlify
rename xvc file checkout to xvc file recheck
body:
- Adds a new ref doc for `xvc file recheck`.
- Adds examples to ref as tests
- Modifies the output thread to report to stdout according to XvcVerbosity
- (Hopes to) fix a heisenbug in test_notify
- Fixes cache file permissions to read-only

title: Fix storage tests
Added "Xvc for DVC users" and added some missing command ref pages
Added cache to arch and updated sidebar to fold
updates to storage help text and synopsis sections
Added Git & Xvc section to book/arch
revised arch/index and arch/storages
body: Closes #168

title: updates cargo index at every step
Add from ref and to branch options to xvc to automate git checkout and git branch
Updated crate licenses to Apache-2.0
Change LICENSE to Apache-2
body: Decided to update the license to a more permissive one.

title: Updated README.md
Add `trycmd` tests for documentation
body:
- How to run the tests in random directories?
-

title: Update GS:ML Engineering section in the book
body:
- added content to machine learning gs page
- renamed developer to development
- Cleanup

title: Rename `xvc file push` to `xvc file send` and `xvc file pull` to `xvc file bring`.
body:
- Remove `xvc file fetch` and merge its functionality as an option in `xvc file bring`. 

- Add `--checkout-as` option to `xvc file bring` to pass to `xvc file checkout`.

title: Fix file track adding directories should not add children to gitignore
body: Fix #104

title: Updated script format
removed -e option from publish-crates script
added publish-crates script
body: Closes #19

title: converted all CLI structs to clap 4.
body:
- parse(from_occurrences) -> ArgMatches::Count

- command and subcommand #[clap(...)] -> #[command(...)]

- argument #[clap(...)] -> #[arg(...)]

title: update credential env variables and add storage-specific credentials for s3 based storages
skip init when storage dir contains xvc guid file for xvc storage new local
body: This PR also makes changes to XvcStorageOperations trait to return a new struct in init, with an older Guid. This allows to reinit with an already existing directory.

title: Add Github action to publish crates for new versions
xvc init should respect to previous .gitignore file.
body: Fixes #119.

title: add xvc storage new rsync command and related tests
body:
This PR adds `xvc storage new rsync` command to use remote storages via rsync. 

Closes #111

To incorporate these changes, merge this Pull Request into the original. We
recommend using the Squash or Rebase strategies.


**NOTE**: As work continues on the original Pull Request, this process will
re-run and update (force-push) this Pull Request with updated style fixes as
necessary. If the style is fixed manually at any point (i.e. this process finds
no fixes to make), this Pull Request will be closed automatically.

Sorry if this was unexpected. To disable it, see our [documentation][].

[restyled]: https://restyled.io
[documentation]: https://github.com/restyled-io/restyled.io/wiki/Disabling-Restyled

title: Add auto commit functionality to stores and ec after operations, fix initial gitignore
body:
This PR adds two options to `config` and moves `core.use_git` to `git.use_git`. 

- `git.auto_commit`: Commits Xvc related files after the operations if `true` (default: true)
- `git.auto_stage`: Stages Xvc related files after the operations if `true` (default: false)
